attributes.action: One week flexible school holiday to reduce demand on holidays and lower cost
attributes.additional_details: Help hard working families afford quality time with their children that they would otherwise not be able to afford due to supply and demand factors when booking holidays during official school holiday periods. This would allow more families to decide when was convenient to take holidays at a time that suits their circumstances.
attributes.background: Allow children an additional full week holiday during any school term time to help reduce impact of demand driven prices for holidays during recognised school holiday times. This will help with family budgets during the cost of living crisis

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617186
